content: I'm glad you found our conversation insightful! Tito's art is certainly worth exploring further. His work is characterized by a unique blend of abstract and figurative elements, incorporating bright colors, bold lines, and rich textures. His art is not only aesthetically stunning but also thought-provoking, often grappling with issues of identity, race, and social justice. So, if you get the chance to view more of his work, I am sure you will find it fascinating.
